steps.title: The Pillar Puzzle
steps.description: In the first main chamber, you encounter a lever and three rotating pillars with animal symbols.
steps.vanilla_solution: Snake, Snake, Whale (Left to Right, facing the gate). Look above the gate for the fallen stones.

mod_notes.note: The lever is moved to the hidden room on the left, guarded by a skeever.
Watch out for the Goblin ambush immediately after pulling the lever.

bugs.fix: You likely didn't set the pillars correctly, or a script is lagging. Wait 10 seconds and try again.

steps.title: The Wounded Frostbite Spider
steps.description: A giant spider descends from the ceiling.
steps.vanilla_strategy: Retreat to the archway where it cannot fit. Use flames or arrows.

mod_notes.note: If you have the 'Wild Companion' perk, you can actually calm this spider.
This spider has high resistance to physical damage. Use Fire magic.

steps.title: The Puzzle Door
steps.description: A large circular door with three rotating rings and a keyhole.
steps.vanilla_solution: Bear, Moth, Owl (Top to Bottom). Inspect the Golden Claw in your inventory and rotate it to see the code.

bugs.fix: Common bug. Save your game, punch the ring, then reload the save. If that fails, open console (`~`), click the door, and type `unlock` or `tcl` to fly through.
Ensure you actually have the Golden Claw. If you returned it to Lucan before coming here, you must steal it back.

steps.title: The Word Wall & Overlord
steps.description: The final chamber with the curved word wall.
steps.vanilla_strategy: Learn the word 'Force'. The Draugr Overlord will burst from the coffin. He carries the Dragonstone.

mod_notes.note: The lighting here is extremely dark. Torches are mandatory.
The Overlord can shout 'Unrelenting Force'. Keep your back away from the ledge or you will be thrown off.
